mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.avatar, f.status AS status -- 直接取出f.status作为结果 FROM sys_follow f LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = f.follow_user_id WHERE f.status = 1 AND f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.update_time DESC

SELECT f1.follow_user_id AS id, u.user_name, u.avatar, f1.update_time, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_follow f2 WHERE f2.user_id = f1.follow_user_id AND f2.follow_user_id = #{myId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS status FROM sys_follow f1 JOIN sys_user u ON f1.follow_user_id = u.id WHERE f1.user_id = #{userId} AND f1.status = 1 ORDER BY f1.update_time DESC;
